##### calculation of IQR
```{python, engine.path="/home/saran/.envn/dsci/bin/python3"}
q1 = df['Age'].quantile(0.25)
q2 = df['Age'].quantile(0.50)
q3 = df['Age'].quantile(0.75)
iqr = q3-q1

display(df['Age'][(df['Age'] < (q1-1.5*iqr)) | (df['Age'] > (q3+1.5*iqr))])
	
df['Age'] = df['Age'].mask((df['Age'] < (q1-1.5*iqr)) | (df['Age'] > (q3+1.5*iqr)))
print(((df['Age'] < (q1-1.5*iqr)) | (df['Age'] > (q3+1.5*iqr))).sum())
df.isnull().sum()
```

##### Convert string categorical variable to a numeric variable
```{python, engine.path="/home/saran/.envn/dsci/bin/python3"}
def gender(x):
	if x == 'male': return 1
	else: return 0

df['Sex'] = df['Sex'].apply(gender)

def port(x):
	if x == 'C': return 1
	elif x == 'Q': return 2
	else: return 3

df['Embarked'] = df['Embarked'].apply(port)
```

```{python, engine.path="/home/saran/.envn/dsci/bin/python3"}
df = df.drop(['PassengerId','Name','Ticket'], axis=1)
df_train = df[pd.notnull(df['Survived'])]
df_test = df[pd.isnull(df['Survived'])]
df_test = df_test.drop('Survived', axis=1)
```
```{python, engine.path="/home/saran/.envn/dsci/bin/python3"}
X = df_train.drop('Survived', axis=1)
y = df_train['Survived'].apply(np.int64)
```

```{python, engine.path="/home/saran/.envn/dsci/bin/python3"}
from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split
X_train, X_test, y_train, y_test = train_test_split(X, y, test_size=0.33, random_state=1)
print(X_train.shape, y_train.shape)
```

```{python, engine.path="/home/saran/.envn/dsci/bin/python3"}
from sklearn.linear_model import LogisticRegression
model = LogisticRegression(max_iter=200)
model.fit(X_train, y_train)
yhat = model.predict(X_test)
```

```{python, engine.path="/home/saran/.envn/dsci/bin/python3"}
from sklearn.metrics import confusion_matrix, mean_absolute_error
confusion_matrix(y_test, yhat)
model.score(X_test,y_test)
```
